tool_description: A comprehensive solution for face recognition and analysis, integrated with a dedicated database. It accurately identifies the location of human faces, provides recognized unique identifiers (UIDs), incorporates liveness detection, determines age and gender, analyzes facial expressions (emotions), and includes facemask detection functionality.
name: Face Recognition
title: Face Recognition

api_list.name: View DB
api_list.description: Read / view all face uids in your DB as "faces_list"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://face-recognition18.p.rapidapi.com/view_db"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-recognition18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://face-recognition18.p.rapidapi.com/view_db"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "face-recognition18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
